name: Compass Children's Center
description: Compass Children's Center offers full-day early education and childcare with a curriculum that focuses on social and emotional development for children, ages 0–5, from homeless and extremely low-income families. Services: - Full-day childcare for 69 children from infant to five years of age - A specialized early childhood curriculum focused on art, music, science and nature, pre-reading, pre-math, and gross motor play - Low teacher to child ratios allow for individualized care for each child - O

howToGetIt: How to get connected: - By phone: Call 415-644-0504 x 2330 and leave a voicemail. Calls will be returned within two business days - Online: Get started by creating an application for the Early Learning For All application portal at www.earlylearningsf.org - Email Heidi Lamar, Program Director at hlamar@compass-sf.org or Zainab Litto, Assistant Program Director at zlitto@compass-sf.org
